title: Summer of Love The Sound of 1967 (2007, Rhino) [flac]
description:
Summer of Love The Sound of 1967 (2007, Rhino) flac

Yet another attempt to capture the world-changing summer on only one cd. No Jefferson Airplane or Scott McKenzie but there is a Mamas & the Papas and a very nice mix of classic pop & rock hits from that year, from Jesse Colin Young to the Monkees, that capture the spirit. This one makes a good start... one of those "you didn't really have to be there" to get it.
A nice companion to the PBS documentary, "The Summer of Love".
Tune in, turn on, drop out. And don't bogart that joint.
